scripts.build-lib-prod: ng build app-shell --configuration production && ng build app-shell-routing-adaptors --configuration production
scripts.build-app-prod: ng build demo --configuration production && ng build concrete-routes-demo --configuration production && ng build dynamic-routes-demo --configuration production
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-lib-prod && npm run build-app-prod
scripts.publish-lib: npm run build-lib-prod && cd dist/libraries/@jamesbenrobb && npm publish ./app-shell && npm publish ./app-shell-routing-adaptors
